page.title: 14THE PUB AT NEWTON.
page.content: The Egon Ronay listed Red Lion is a popular venue for meals throughout South Lincolnshire and beyond.The owners bought the pub by exchanging the hire purchase payment on a sports car to the mortgage payment on the property.The rooms are low-ceilinged and are furnished with old cottage furniture and interesting local items which have been collected by the landlord and his wife.A Squash Club has been added and draws most of its members from Sleaford and Grantham areas.From the pub a great many events are organised every year:discos;barn dances;barbecues;treasure hunts; bonfire and Christmas parties.Some of the proceeds and special raffles held by the landlord benefit the village funds.
